p: In Hong Kong, a new bundle of treatment guidelines for the management of various common infectious diseases was formulated and published in 2017 [ 5]. It would be important to determine the latest epidemiology of CAP, clinicians’ adherence to these guidelines, and the impact of guideline adherence on patients’ outcomes. Therefore, we aim to determine the aetiologies, severity, and immediate and long-term outcomes in adults hospitalized for CAP and to study the impact of empirical antibiotic therapy on patient outcomes.
